src_original: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayati - yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ vigrahā vivādā virodhā utsārayitavyā nidhyāpayitavyāḥ praśamayitavyāḥ,
tgt_original: 「若諸眾生有所諍競，應發是心： 『我當勸勉。

src_original: so 'haṃ nāma svayameva vivadāmi /  lābhā me durlabdhā na sulabdhāḥ,  yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi /
tgt_original: 我今於此諍競得無難遇，若諍競者及所諍事。

src_original: yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyam,  so 'haṃ pareṣu tvamity api vācaṃ bhāṣe,  paruṣaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā prativaco dadāmi /  idam api mayā naiva vaktavyam /
tgt_original: 然我於諸眾生為作橋梁，我若為他惡罵毀呰，汝何此語不應加報？

src_original: jaḍasadṛśena eḍamūkasamena mayā kalahavigrahavivādeṣu bhavitavyam,
tgt_original: 但類癡人及若啞羊不起鬪諍。

src_original: parato duruktāni durāgatāni durbhāṣitāni bhāṣyamāṇāni śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyam /  pareṣāmantike na mamaitatsādhu,  na caitanmamāṃ pratirūpam,  yo 'haṃ parasya doṣāntaraṃ saṃjāne /
tgt_original: 他或惡來醜言罵辱，於語言道心無損害，親近於他我應善語，不似於彼起斯過咎。

src_original: etad api me na pratirūpam,  yadahaṃ pareṣa doṣāntaram api śrotavyaṃ manye /
tgt_original: 乃至若我聞他過失亦不似彼。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 所以者何？

src_original: yena mayā sarvasattvāḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sukhayitavyāḥ,  parinirvāpayitavyāś ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya,
tgt_original: 又若一切眾生所須妙樂者，我當與彼眾生妙樂乃至涅盤，成證阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyālakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,  na saṃtrasitavyam,  na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩設於惡獸難中，不生驚惱亦無怖畏。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaṃ parityaktavyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
tgt_original: 是菩薩即作是念： 『我當利益諸眾生故一切皆捨。

src_original: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - yadi cenmāṃ vyālā bhakṣayeyuḥ,  tebhya eva taddānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /  mama ca dānapāramitāparipūrirbhaviṣyati /
tgt_original: 若諸惡獸欲噉我者，我當施與，速得圓滿施波羅蜜。

src_original: anuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhirāsannībhaviṣyati /  tathā ca kariṣyāmi,  yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra me buddhakṣetre na  na prajñāsyante,  divyopabhogaparibhogāś ca bhaviṣyantīti //
tgt_original: 願我當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，國土清淨，不聞諸惡蟲獸之名。

src_original: punaraparaṃ śāriputra corakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,  na saṃtrasitavyam,  na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
tgt_original: 』復次舍利子！ 若菩薩摩訶薩於怨賊難中，不生驚惱亦無怖畏。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalābhiratā hi (Vaidya 179)  bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti /
tgt_original: 是菩薩若己所有皆悉能捐。

src_original: tebhya eva taddānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu /  yadi cenmāṃ kecijjīvitādvyaparopayeyuḥ,
tgt_original: 『若諸怨賊來欲所須，我當與之。

src_original: tatra na mayā vyāpādakrodharoṣā utpādayitavyāḥ /  teṣām api ca mayā na kāyena na vācā na manasā aparāddhavyam /  evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /  anuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhirabhyāsannībhaviṣyati /  tathā ca kariṣyāmi,  tathā ca pratipatsye,
tgt_original: 乃至劫取斷我命根，身語意業亦無瞋恨，速得圓滿戒波羅蜜，及得具足忍波羅蜜。

src_original: yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataścorakāntārāṇy api tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
tgt_original: 願我當成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，國土清淨，不聞如是怨賊之名。

src_original: punaraparaṃ śāriputraṃ pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩於渴乏難中，亦無怖畏。

src_original: tatkasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: evaṃ cānena cittamutpādayitavyam - sarvasattvānāṃ mayā sarvatṛṣṇācchedāya śikṣitavyam /  na ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvenotrasitavyam,
tgt_original: 即作是念： 『我今當為一切眾生宣說法要斷除渴愛。

src_original: na saṃtrasitavyam,  na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /  sacedahaṃ tṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kariṣyāmi,  pretaloke mamopapattirbhaviṣyatīti /  api tu khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike mahākaruṇācittamutpādayitavyam - aho bata alpapuṇyā amī sattvāḥ,  yadeteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante /
tgt_original: 設我此身為渴所逼趣命終者，復於後世起大悲心，嗟此眾生薄福德故，還復生此無水難中，令修正行具足勝惠，而能圓滿精進波羅蜜多。

src_original: tathā punarahaṃ kariṣyāmi,  tathā pratipatsye,  yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti,  na prajñāsyante /
tgt_original: 願我當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，國土清淨，不聞如是渴乏之名。

src_original: tathā ca sarvasattvān puṇyaiḥ saṃniyokṣye,  yathā aṣṭāṅgopetapānīyalābhino 'mī bhaviṣyanti /  tathā ca dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
tgt_original: 其中眾生具足福德，自然而有八功德水。
